DOC.brief_summary: A 10-week safety tolerability study potential treatment mild moderate Alzheimer 's disease .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Tolerability Evaluation Two 10-Week Dose Regimens Orally-Administered PF-04494700 Alzheimer 's Patients
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis probably Alzheimer 's disease least 1 year . Mini Mental State Exam ( MMSE ) score 1226 screening . Participants must receive cholinesterase inhibitor and/or memantine least 4 month , stable dose least 2 month . Current evidence neurological psychiatric illness could contribute dementia . Living alone . Poorly control high blood pressure .
